snippet: Television coverage of the trial of Anders Behring Breivik, the gunman who has admitted that he killed 77 people during twin attacks in Norway last year, showed him smiling, crying and raising his fist in a salute.
abstract: Television coverage of the trial of Anders Behring Breivik, the gunman who has admitted that he killed 77 people during twin attacks in Norway last year, showed him smiling, crying and raising his fist in a salute.

headline.main: Video of Anders Behring Breivik in Court
